Header.title: Welcome to SOWS
Header.paragraph: Welcome to SOWS, an app designed to control CS characters using music literature. Press the button below to download the Alpha realease of SOWS.

About.paragraph: Hello guys, I'm SBK and I enjoy creating, whatever it may be. I started my Dev journey in late 2020 and early 2021 and have been absolutely stoked with it at the time. I freelance for Web Development and am looking for opportunities in Machine Learning and Data Science. I have a passion for learning whatever new technology I lay my eyes on.

Features.title: Change Drivers.
Features.text: Change drivers to handle various instruments.

Features.title: Test your working.
Features.text: Test detection of notes/signal using in-app features.

Features.title: Zero Distraction
Features.text: SOWS jumps to System Tray. So forget about it and put all your focus on getting good.
